text: @marcorubio We know you scan the bible and internet for witty bible quotes...but I have no reason to believe you follow any of the teachings you post. So what, God will resurrect those killed by coronavirus & GOP policies? Come on Senator...little more effort please.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
